rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your party isn’t full, The Southern Pantheon isn’t a creature. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on each turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
{2}{W}{W}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
